sentences.sContent: I simply mean that we intuitively understand collaboration.
sentences.sContent_eng: I simply mean that we intuitively understand collaboration.
sentences.sCn: 我仅仅是说我们直观地了解协作。

sentences.sContent: People intuitively know you usually get what you pay for, and those who are good at what they do rarely give it away without some special reason.
sentences.sContent_eng: People intuitively know you usually get what you pay for, and those who are good at what they do rarely give it away without some special reason.
sentences.sCn: 人们往往会根据你的酬金来直观地了解你，如果没有什么特殊原因的话，那些专长于某方面的人是很少会放弃报酬的）。

words.tran: 直觉；直觉力；直觉的知识
